name: ROX
overview: Defend you lunar module by firing off rockets to intercept incoming meteors. Too many ground impacts result in an earthquake! Survive 60 meteors for a bonus and rescue by the mothership. Also published in C+VG 1984/01 (Issue #27), Commodore User 1985/06 (Games Extra Book), SYS PD Club64 #1 (1990), and in SYS PD Diskett#05 (1991).
